Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By hemolytic assay , she exhibited 1 - 2 % of the normal serum C5 level and normal concentrations of other complement components .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Hemolytic assay |
| C5 level |
| Complement components |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| Hemolytic assay |

I removed "C5 level" and "Complement components" from the table as they are not diseases, but rather laboratory test results and components of the immune system, respectively.
